description:
ICOContract.constructor(address,address)._ICOTokenHolder (contracts/ICOContract.sol#50) lacks a zero-check on :
		- ICOTokenHolder = _ICOTokenHolder (contracts/ICOContract.sol#53)

ICOContract.distributeToken() (contracts/ICOContract.sol#67-86) uses arbitrary from in transferFrom: success = tokenContract.transferFrom(ICOTokenHolder,msg.sender,tokens) (contracts/ICOContract.sol#80)

ICOContract.distributeToken() (contracts/ICOContract.sol#67-86) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- tokens = ((msg.value / tokenPrice) * 10 ** 18) (contracts/ICOContract.sol#73)
markdown:
[ICOContract.distributeToken()](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L67-L86) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [tokens = ((msg.value / tokenPrice) * 10 ** 18)](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L73)

description:
Token.constructor(string,string).name (contracts/Token.sol#12) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#62-64) (function)
	- IERC20Metadata.name() (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol#17) (function)

Token.constructor(string,string).symbol (contracts/Token.sol#12) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#70-72) (function)
	- IERC20Metadata.symbol() (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol#22) (function)

Reentrancy in ICOContract.distributeToken() (contracts/ICOContract.sol#67-86):
	External calls:
	- success = tokenContract.transferFrom(ICOTokenHolder,msg.sender,tokens) (contracts/ICOContract.sol#80)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Investment(msg.sender,msg.value,tokens) (contracts/ICOContract.sol#83)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [ICOContract.distributeToken()](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L67-L86):
	External calls:
	- [success = tokenContract.transferFrom(ICOTokenHolder,msg.sender,tokens)](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L80)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Investment(msg.sender,msg.value,tokens)](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L83)

description:
ICOContract.getIcoStatus() (contracts/ICOContract.sol#95-108) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= icoStartTime && block.timestamp <= icoEndTime (contracts/ICOContract.sol#99)
	- block.timestamp <= icoStartTime (contracts/ICOContract.sol#102)
markdown:
[ICOContract.getIcoStatus()](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L95-L108) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [block.timestamp >= icoStartTime && block.timestamp <= icoEndTime](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L99)
	- [block.timestamp <= icoStartTime](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L102)

description:
Different versions of Solidity are used:
	- Version used: ['^0.8.0', '^0.8.18']
	- ^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol#4)
	- ^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#4)
	- ^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol#4)
	- ^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol#4)
	- ^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Context.sol#4)
	- ^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/interfaces/IERC20.sol#4)
	- ^0.8.18 (contracts/ICOContract.sol#2)
	- ^0.8.18 (contracts/Token.sol#2)

Different versions of Solidity are used:
	- Version used: ['^0.8.0', '^0.8.18']

	- [^0.8.0](node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Context.sol#L4)
	- [^0.8.0](node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/interfaces/IERC20.sol#L4)
	- [^0.8.18](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L2)

description: Pragma version^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol#4) allows old versions
Pragma version^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#4) allows old versions
Pragma version^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol#4) allows old versions
Pragma version^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol#4) allows old versions
Pragma version^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Context.sol#4) allows old versions
Pragma version^0.8.18 (contracts/ICOContract.sol#2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.16
markdown: Pragma version[^0.8.18](contracts/ICOContract.sol#L2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.16

description: Pragma version^0.8.0 (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/interfaces/IERC20.sol#4) allows old versions
solc-0.8.18 is not recommended for deployment
markdown: solc-0.8.18 is not recommended for deployment

description:
Low level call in ICOContract.withdrawETH() (contracts/ICOContract.sol#89-92):
	- (success) = administrator.call{value: receivedFund}() (contracts/ICOContract.sol#90)
Variable ICOContract.ICOTokenHolder (contracts/ICOContract.sol#17) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.mintToken(uint256)._amount (contracts/Token.sol#16) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.burnToken(uint256)._amount (contracts/Token.sol#21) is not in mixedCase
Constant Token.initialSupply (contracts/Token.sol#9) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES
Constant Token.maxSupply (contracts/Token.sol#10) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

description: ICOContract.icoTarget (contracts/ICOContract.sol#29) should be constant
ICOContract.maxInvestment (contracts/ICOContract.sol#35) should be constant
ICOContract.minInvestment (contracts/ICOContract.sol#36) should be constant
ICOContract.tokenPrice (contracts/ICOContract.sol#23) should be constant
ICOContract.ICOTokenHolder (contracts/ICOContract.sol#17) should be immutable
ICOContract.administrator (contracts/ICOContract.sol#20) should be immutable
ICOContract.icoEndTime (contracts/ICOContract.sol#42) should be immutable
ICOContract.icoStartTime (contracts/ICOContract.sol#41) should be immutable
ICOContract.tokenContract (contracts/ICOContract.sol#12) should be immutable
